mapper.select: SELECT R.REFUND_NO, R.TRADE_NO, R.PRODUCT_NO, TO_CHAR(R.REFUND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REFUND_DATE, R.REFUND_REASON, R.REFUND_STATUS, TO_CHAR(T.TRADE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TRADE_DATE, SELLER.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS SELLER_NICKNAME, BUYER.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS BUYER_NICKNAME FROM REFUND_TBL R JOIN TRADE_TBL T ON R.TRADE_NO = T.TRADE_NO JOIN MEMBER_TBL SELLER ON T.TRADE_SELLER = SELLER.MEMBER_NO JOIN MEMBER_TBL BUYER ON T.TRADE_BUYER = BUYER.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY 1 DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE REFUND_TBL SET REFUND_STATUS = 2 WHERE REFUND_NO = #{refundNo}
UPDATE TRADE_TBL SET TRADE_STATE = '환불' WHERE TRADE_NO = #{tradeNo}
update refund_tbl set refund_status = 1 where refund_no =#{refundNo}
update trade_tbl set TRADE_STATE = '구매확정' where trade_no =#{tradeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT P.*, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM PRODUCT_TBL P JOIN MEMBER_TBL M ON P.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE to_char(P.PRODUCT_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') between #{filterStartDate} and #{filterEndDate}
